metadata.name: Fighting Spirit
metadata.description:
Time & location : Early one spring morning, french Alps, near Chamonix.

After a cold, wet night spent in a hide, I am awakened by the dull sound of horns clashing.
These two ibex fight for their territory and their membership in the horde and the fight resounds between the mountains

This photograph is a suspended moment of this struggle captured from my shelter.

The owner of this NFT can claim to myself a fine art print of the photograph which will be sent to him.
